entries.name: Vicuna
entries.desc: An open-source chatbot impressing GPT-4 with 90%* ChatGPT quality.

entries.name: LongChat
entries.desc: A series of open-source chatbots with long context length (16K - 32K).

entries.name: FastChat-T5
entries.desc: A commercial-friendly, compact, yet powerful chat assistant.

entries.name: LMSYS-Chat-1M
entries.desc: This dataset contains one million real-world conversations with 25 state-of-the-art LLMs.

entries.name: Chatbot Arena Conversations
entries.desc: This dataset contains 33K cleaned conversations with pairwise human preferences collected on Chatbot Arena.

entries.name: ToxicChat
entries.desc: This dataset contains 10K high-quality data for content moderation in real-world user-AI interactions based on user queries from the Vicuna online demo.

entries.name: Chatbot Arena
entries.desc: A benchmark platform for large language models (LLMs) that features anonymous, randomized battles in a crowdsourced manner. It comes with a leaderboard based on Elo ratings.

entries.name: MT-Bench
entries.desc: A set of challenging, multi-turn, and open-ended questions for evaluating chat assistants. It uses LLM-as-a-judge to evaluate model responses.

entries.name: FastChat
entries.desc: An open and scalable platform for training, finetuning, serving, and evaluating LLM-based chatbots.

entries.name: S-LoRA
entries.desc: A scalable serving system for multiple concurrent LoRA adapters.
